email_chain.subject: Inquiry: FOB Santos to Rotterdam - Soybean Meal - Vessel Offer
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this message finds you well. We have a shipment of 15,000MT of soybean meal from Santos to Rotterdam under FOB terms. Could you provide a vessel offer and an initial freight quote? We are looking for a laycan between October 5th and October 10th.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Santos to Rotterdam - Soybean Meal - Vessel Offer
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel MV OCEAN STAR, which is currently available and can meet your laycan requirements. The initial freight quote is $45/MT. The vessel has a DWT of 50,000 and an LOA of 190m. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Global Freight Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Santos to Rotterdam - Soybean Meal - Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Emily,

Thank you for the prompt response. The rate of $45/MT seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Could you possibly review this? We are looking for a rate closer to $40/MT. Also, could you confirm the demurrage rates and the expected loading window in Santos?

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Santos to Rotterdam - Soybean Meal - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

After reviewing the market conditions, we can offer a revised rate of $42/MT. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day pro rata. The loading window in Santos is expected to be 3 days, starting from October 5th. Please let me know if this revised offer is acceptable.

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Santos to Rotterdam - Soybean Meal - Acceptance
email_chain.body:
Emily,

Thank you for the revised offer. The rate of $42/MT is acceptable. Please confirm the details and let's proceed with fixing the vessel.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Santos to Rotterdam - Soybean Meal - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Great to hear that the revised offer works for you. We will proceed with fixing the MV OCEAN STAR for your shipment. The laycan is confirmed for October 5th to October 10th, with a loading window of 3 days in Santos. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day pro rata. We will send the fixture confirmation shortly.

Best regards,
Emily
